Package theaterapp

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
theaterapp.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
AreaSelectionScreen, DateSelectionScreen, ErrorScreen, IdiomSelectionScreen, PaymentScreen, SeatSelectionScreen, WellcomeScreen
public class Screen extends Object
Abstrac class with all the primary operation to be implemented when it is inherit, to be adapted depending on the objective of the child class
